CustomField.formula: IF( NotaSocioemocionalA2__c < 13, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015Z00000037TXB", "Verde", 30, 30), IF( NotaSocioemocionalA2__c > 12 && NotaSocioemocionalA2__c < 30, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015Z00000037TXG", "Amarelo", 30, 30), IF( NotaSocioemocionalA2__c > 29 && NotaSocioemocionalA2__c < 47 , IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015Z00000037TXL", "Laranja", 30, 30), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015Z00000037TXQ", "Azul", 30, 30) )))
